verses.roman:
tina janāra bhoga teṅho ekelā khāilā
jagannātha-nṛsiṁha upavāsī ha-ilā"

synonyms: tina janāra—of the three Deities; bhoga—offerings; teṅho—He; ekelā—alone; khāilā—ate; jagannātha-nṛsiṁha—Lord Jagannātha and Lord Nṛsiṁhadeva; upavāsī ha-ilā—remained fasting.
translation: "He alone has eaten the offerings for all three Deities. Because of this, both Jagannātha and Nṛsiṁhadeva remain fasting."
